# vpsie Provider

The VPSie provider is used to manage resources on the [VPSie](https://vpsie.com/) cloud platform. You must configure the provider with an API access token before you can use it.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "vpsie" {
  access_token = var.vpsie_access_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive) VPSie API access token. Can also be set with the `VPSIE_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variable.
